thread.title: AMAZING for gossip girl fans!!
thread.title_full: AMAZING for gossip girl fans!! - Review of Empire Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: KShaw29
title: AMAZING for gossip girl fans!!
text:
i stayed here for 3 nights with my boyfriend in August 2016, ive been a fan of gossip girl for years and this is the famous chuck bass's hotel! Many scenes were shot here and they even have a dedicated cocktail called 'The chuck bass'.
This hotel is beautiful and would be amazing for non gossip girl fans also.
absolutely perfect location and service.
